Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm so happy to
see you. You always brighten my day.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Having someone
young around is a big help. I can ask
you to do all the strenuous work.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>It's hard when you get to be my age. So
if anything happens to me, I'm counting
on you.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, good morning. How are you, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Hohoho, won't you have tea with me? I
want to chat.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You seem so busy. Work
hard and do your best.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello. When I look at you, <MYNAME>, I
feel like I'm talking to my grandchild.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Thanks to you, I feel
like I've gotten a new lease on life.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Oh, thank you for
coming to see me so late.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, good evening. It's dark already, so
hurry and go to bed.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good evening. Isn't it quiet in these
parts? When you get to be my age, this
silence is nice.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How are you, <MYNAME>? Isn't it a warm
day? It's good for my hips and makes
it easier to walk.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Today's weather is bad. On
days like this, my hips hurt.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Isn't it a hot day, <MYNAME>? It's
especially tough when you're old. I envy
you young ones.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
On rainy days, I have to be extra
careful that I don't fall.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, don't run so hard. It's 
dangerous, so be careful.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Days like this are best
for making dried food.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm working hard to send some to my
grandchild. I hope it's appreciated.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. The rain and the 
temperature has gotten colder. I guess
it'll soon be winter.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh dear, <MYNAME>. Are you working in this
cold? Well, take care.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh dear, <MYNAME>. This cold is hard to
take, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>At my age, you get chilled to the bone.
When it's this cold, it's hard to sleep
at night.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It makes me so happy that you're worried
about me. But when there's a typhoon,
you should stay at home.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It makes me so happy that you're worried
about me. But when there's a blizzard,
you should stay at home.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, so you found a sweetheart? Good
for you.
<PAGE>
You have to work at a relationship, so
don't get into arguments. I'm rooting
for you.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Long ago, many of the townspeople came
to this forest to pick food. They don't
come around too much now.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This forest is part of my walking
course. It's so much fun walking through
it. Hohoho.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the old days, we came all the way to
this river to do the washing. No one
would do such a thing now.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fish you catch here is delicious. I
love them! <MYNAME>, please try.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, climbing this far is tiring. Aging
is really no fun.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love the view from here. It's a very
calming scene.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't this farm nice? Before you came,
they were took care of it.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is running a farm difficult? If you need
anything, just come to the store. You
are always welcome, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The ground around the mine is very
uneven and it's hard for me to walk.
Maybe I should rest a bit.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's right. This used to be a secret
meeting place for lovers.
<PAGE>
My sweetheart and I came here for long
talks too. Isn't it embarrassing?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are still so few people. 
<MYNAME>, please hang in there. We won't
give up either.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The number of people seems to be
increasing. Let's give it our best. I'm
sure the town will liven up.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town has really come alive. There
are more people and we can have lots of
more fun festivals now.
<PAGE>
Everyone is happy.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a great town this has become. And
it's all thanks to you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Everyone is so grateful. Please continue
to do your best.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm close to Emma and she always takes
time to chat with me. She's a good girl.
<PAGE>
She watches out for me and always stops
by my house. It's a joy talking to her.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love to knit and make small
accessories. I make a lot of them for
my grandchild.
<PAGE>
Oh, that's right. How about if I make
something for you, <MYNAME>? I'll make
sure to stock the materials I need.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I work in my general store, but really,
all I do is sit.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>When customers come, we start talking.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>And everyone feels comfortable like
they're at their grandma's house.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My kids and grandchild live in
another town. My grandchild is the apple
of my eye.
<PAGE>
I would anything for my grandchild. I'm
such a doting grandma, don't you think?
Hohoho.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My dream is...to live in this town with
my grandchild. I hope it's possible
while I'm still alive.
<PAGE>
So until then, I want to make this town
a better place. <MYNAME>, let's do our
best, all right?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've lived in this town since the day I
was born.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I watched as everyone left this town and
felt so sad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But this town is reviving and I'm
grateful to you. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We've been friends for quite a long time
now. Thank you for being such a good
companion.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I'm so glad I got to know such a
wonderful person. Let's continue to be
friends.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, is that soy milk ice cream in your
hand? Oh, it's for me?
<PAGE>
What a good girl you are. Oh my, you've
made me cry. I'm sorry.
<PAGE>
Mmm, it's so good. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, is this for me?
<PAGE>
I love this, you know. I gratefully
accept, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. You don't have to
worry about me. But I gratefully accept.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I don't mind if I do.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear, thank you. Oh, this is...
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I guess you're not comfortable with an
old woman like me. Sure, I don't mind if
I do.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, for me? Are you sure this isn't some
mistake?
<PAGE>
O-Oh, all right. I'll take it, but next
time, don't bother.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
*Cough*
<PAGE>
Oh, this is vichyssoise? Do young people
think this tastes good? I can't
understand why they would.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My, my, such a large turnip. Did you
grow this, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I can pickle this or use it in a soup.
There are so many ways to prepare it.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. You gave me one so
big. I'm very happy.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ack! What a shock!
<PAGE>
I've never seen such a large turnip. I-I
nearly fell over.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thank you, <MYNAME>. It pays to live a
long life, you know. You never know what
wonders you'll see.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I-Isn't this a bit huge? Can you eat
something this big? Thank you, I'll try
cooking it.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I can't accept that. Please
take it with you.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, I don't need so much. Please take
it with you.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
This is soy milk ice cream. How sweet of
you... Now you've gone and made me cry.
<PAGE>
Yes, it tastes good. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
I was just wondering what to do about
dinner... This is a favorite of mine.
<PAGE>
Yes, I'm going to enjoy it. Thank you
for bringing it, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>, for thinking of
someone like me. I'm so grateful.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I accept.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Oh, this is... I don't know if this is
quite the thing for someone old like me.
<PAGE>
But that's okay. I accept your present.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
Oh, this is for me? Are you sure this
isn't a mistake?
<PAGE>
I-I see... Then I'll accept, but as a
birthday present...?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>*cough*
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>This is vichyssoise? Do young people
think this is good? I can't understand
young peoples' tastes.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
My, such a large turnip. Did you grow
this, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I can pickle this or use it in a soup.
There are so many ways to prepare it.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. It's so big. I'm very
happy.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
I've never seen such a large turnip. I-I
nearly fell over.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. It pays to live long,
doesn't it? You never know what you'll
get to see.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You have a birthday present
for me? You're so kind.
<PAGE>
Isn't this a bit huge? Can you eat
something this big? Thank you, I'll try
cooking it.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Now, now, don't peck at me. My finger 
isn't your food.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oww... This one pecks a lot. My finger
is so sore.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
No, stop that. I'm going to get hurt if
a big one like you pecks at me.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I was bitten by a dog once. Ever since
then, I've been leery of dogs. I'm
sorry.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I was bitten by a dog once. Ever since
then, I've been leery of dogs. I'm
sorry.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I was bitten by a dog once. Ever since
then, I've been leery of dogs. I'm
sorry.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I was bitten by a dog once. Ever since
then, I've been leery of dogs. I'm
sorry.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hoho, you are so cute, kitty. Kitty
comes to my house once in a while. She
loves it when I feed her.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What's the name of this chubby kitty? I
see, that's nice name. She's very cute.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Stroking her feels like I'm stroking my
grandchild's head. Hohoho.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You have beautiful fur, even if you've
gotten a bit chubby. It feels so nice.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A Flower Festival present? I'm so happy!
<PAGE>
Oh, where shall I display it? On the
table? Or by my bedside? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is it all right for an old woman like me
to accept? Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, a blue shuttlecock. It must be
decades ago that my husband gave me one.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, what a pretty ring. It must be
decades ago that my husband gave me one.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is she your pet, <MYNAME>? No? But it must
have taken you a long time to get her
so tame.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel sorry for them if they're caught.
Animals in the wild deserve to be free.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's your birthday, right, <MYNAME>? It's
not much, but please accept it.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, <MYNAME>. It's been quite a while,
hasn't it? How have you been?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Go to Kohana General Store for sundries.
If there's anything you want, just let
me know.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Would you like some too?
It's delicious.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Red benches are so nice. I feel like
I've been sitting here for hours. Why
don't you join me?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a weather vane. Which way is the
wind blowing today?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at the milk cans. They really make
this look like a farm.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at the bales of grass. They really 
make this look like a farm.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a pretty jar. It has such a nice,
red color. I wonder what it's for?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a large desk. It's spacious and 
everyone could enjoy dinner here.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How unusual, a traditional tea bench.
<PAGE>
If you have a tea ceremony, please 
invite me.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What pretty street lights. There are two
lights, so it's safe at night.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a bonfire, but is there a
festival going on?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Paper lanterns give off such soft, dim
light. It's perfect for someone who's
elderly.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, there's a stone lantern. How elegant
it looks.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The red brick pillar looks like it's
from another age.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a well. In the old days, we all 
got water from a well.
<PAGE>
And in summer, we'd chill watermelons.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A pine decoration...I haven't seen one
of these in years. 
<PAGE>
It used to be that people would decorate
their front entries with these for new
years.
<PAGE>
When you saw pine decorations, you knew
that it was a new year.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This panda decoration...Huh? It's a
ride? Oh then, I'd like to ride it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Huh? You need coins? I don't have any.
Oh well, that's too bad. No ride on a
panda for me.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There are so many nostalgic things in
this area.
<PAGE>
I feel like I'm back in the old days.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There are so many nostalgic things in
this area. I'm starting to get excited.
<PAGE>
Just looking around will be interesting.
This stroll is going to be fun.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Potted plants are nice. You can place
them anywhere and look at them anytime,
and taking care of them is fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But you don't get bamboo shoots from
potted bamboo.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're trying your hand at bonsai? Isn't
it quite difficult?
<PAGE>
But when it takes the shape you want, it
must be such a joy.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Potted plants are nice. You can place
them anywhere and look at them anytime,
and taking care of them is fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But a potted cherry tree is too small
for flower viewing.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Potted plants are nice. You can place
them anywhere and look at them anytime,
and taking care of them is fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But 
sweeping up gingko leaves is a real
chore.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Conifers are green even during winter
and so pretty. They have nice shapes
and are perfect for landscaping.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hedges harmonize the landscape and are 
perfect for walking paths.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You have a bamboo grove. When the bamboo
shoots come out, may I have a couple?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You made a cow decoration? It's
gorgeous! It almost looks alive.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You made a sheep decoration? It's
gorgeous! It almost looks alive.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You made a cow art decoration? It's
gorgeous! It almost looks alive.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You made a cow art decoration? It's
gorgeous! It almost looks alive.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't that nice? An arch with red
flowers. It just tickles my heart. I
feel young again.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't that a nice red fence? I love the
color red.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel safe when there's a railing to
hold. At my age, I have to be careful
when I walk.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The red brick fence brings back memories
of houses of the past.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you have a greenhouse, you can eat
delicious vegetables anytime of the
year.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You have a rice field. When you harvest 
your delicious crop, would you mind
sharing some?
Let's hold off on the gifts for now.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If there's a hair salon, I enjoy going
once in a while to look nice. Not that
it makes much difference though.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even if there's a clothes shop, I
haven't bought clothes in a long while.
<PAGE>
Can an old woman like me even find
clothes that will look good?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Going to a restaurant to eat once in a
while is nice, isn't it? Especially
if there's such a good place.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Traveling? Oh at my age, it becomes a
chore just to go out.
<PAGE>
There's a travel agency, but I just
stop by there during my stroll.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If there's a tea salon, maybe they
serve soy milk ice cream.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't want to move at my age. I plan
to live here for the rest of my life.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How nice that the town is growing. With
more people and more customers, I'm
going to have do my best too.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This part of town is very westernized.
It's nice and well taken care of, but
I just don't feel settled here.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's more comfortable when things
are eastern-style and you're used to
the scenery. Don't you think so?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This area looks more tropical. I don't
think it's bad.
<PAGE>
In fact, it's nice to go for walks in
a place like this.
